name: Baltz Ascension
description:
Baltz Ascenption.

Baltz is Merlin’s most powerful disciple, who always had envy on Merlin’s Powers. He desired his master’s powers for over a thousand years, always trying to exceed his master powers, and be claimed as the most powerful wizard. 
After all that time willing those powers unsuccessfully, Baltz has lost his hopes, and was ready to give up, but then, the chance of a lifetime shown up. Merlin disappeared without leaving any trace, and rumors said, that his magic book, with all his knowledge and power, was left behind.
Many wizard of all around, are travelling now to Merlin’s castle, to try to find his most unique treasure, but they will find a real challenge waiting them. The magic castle flies at five thousand meters from the ground, and has many magic traps around it.
A lot of frustration and failure is found on the magic’s castle battlefield, since most of spells are useless to get to the castle, but Baltz has a secret that gives him a real advantage. He learned from his master the terrain creation spell, and he’ll use it to reach the castle.
But will him achieve he’s goal, and become the most powerful magician? Let’s find it together.
